item.title: Notepad Clone 1.7.1-prerelease
item.description: - Added snap dock actions with shortcuts (left/right/bottom) - Layout now auto-saves on dock/toolbar moves and visibility changes - Per-tab editor splitter sizes persist by file path - AI chat dock can be placed on left/right/bottom - More features to customize at settings - More changelogs can be shown at changelog.md in the repository.
